name: ReportFactWithDetails

methods.name: getKey
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier for a row or column grouping. This identifier can be used to index specific data values within each grouping.

methods.name: getRows
methods.description: Returns a list of detailed report data in the order of the detail columns that are provided by the report metadata.
